website_summaries.verdict: A refreshing peppermint mouthwash that will keep on working for hours.
pros: Pleasant peppermint taste with no burning
Some users claim fresh mouth feeling lasts overnight
cons: Users say it doesn't live up to its claim of 12 hours of freshness

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU LOOK VERY CLOSELY, THIS IS SUPPOSED TO BE PEPPERMINT BLAST, WHEN I RECEIVED IT IN THE MAIL TODAY, IT IS JUST PLAIN PEPPERMINT AND THERE IS A DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE TWO. THIS IS FALSE ADVERTISING I FEEL!
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Poor Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a great value. However, Amazon delivery leaves something to be desired. The person who delivered it left in the garden on the ground next to my stoop. My front stoop is 4' by 6', leaving it on the ground in my garden was just plain carelessness.
customer_reviews.author: Heyspock

customer_reviews.title: My dentist recommended this for my low-level gingivitis and overall dental health
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended this for my low-level gingivitis and overall dental health. It's alcohol-free (alcohol isn't great for the gums and teeth, anyway, but, as a recovered alcoholic, I didn't want to be putting 10-25% ethyl alcohol in my mouth) and seems to be, IIRC, the only mouthwash type that is suitable both for general hygiene and gingivitis. This six-pack option also seemed to be the most economical option on Amazon at least for my needs, though a Prime Pantry offer or going elsewhere would likely be cheaper if you don't wish to buy in large bulk here.
customer_reviews.author: Roketsune

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mouthwash for healthy teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mouthwash for a little over a year now, and I’ve seen a noticeable difference. In between dentist visits, no matter how much I brushed or flossed, there would always be a little bit of plaque buildup. After my last dentist visit a few weeks ago, my hygienist said that I’ll be set for life if I keep my routine up! The only downside about this mouthwash is it has a little bit of a funny mint taste (which is why I use it before flossing and brushing). Other than that, I highly recommend adding this to your daily routine!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel T.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Listerine
customer_reviews.text: Dentist recommended to stop using listerine with alcohol. I tried this and couldn't believe how much better it was. My mouth feels fresher without alcohol and stays that way for a long period of time. Dentist says alcohol is not good for gums.
customer_reviews.author: mariaa33

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy for your oral health!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. The mouth wash was strong enough to make me feel clean and fresh. I used it mostly morning and night and gargled deep back in throat to kill any corona virus. It was recommended since the virus can attack the throat First. I also tried the other brand, Listerine, oh my, so strong not pleasant like this one.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: More pleasant taste than what I had been buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this partly because of the advertised features, especially the supposed superiority in killing gingivitis, and I find I really like the flavor. It does not have the long-chain organic alcohols that were present in my previous product and has less burning sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, no burning sensation and seems to work just ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try this out. Having been a Listerine user for years I was looking for something different. I found it with Colgate Total Advanced Pro Shield. Tastes great, no burning sensation and seems to work just as effectively as Listerine. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Bottle Size
customer_reviews.text: I like Colgate but sizes in the stores are expensive for just 1 big good size bottle so i saw the 3 pack thought it was great size value compared to other places i have shopped and got the better deal nothing negative i can say about product just love Colgate and worth it to.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fresh relief :)
customer_reviews.text: Not like any other mouthwash I’ve ever had! It leaves me with a cleaner feeling and doesn’t sting my mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good
customer_reviews.text: My kids use this and they seem to like it. They say it's "spicy" when they use it, but when I smell their breath, it does smell good. So, I guess it's doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkbait

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have the strong kick. Kids enjoy
customer_reviews.text: This one is more tolerable in your mouth. It doesn’t have the same antiseptic cake that I was looking for but the kids like this much better than the hard-core stuff I was really thinking it was
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: nice mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: First time I use it to wash my mouth is kind strong mint favor but when you get used to it is kind cool and way better good mouthwash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I was tired of burning my mouth with Listerine 3 times a day. These are perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Great  mouthwash.
customer_reviews.text: Great Mouthwash. I love the fact that it’s not a strong tasting mouthwash very easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my dentist. Leaves a clean crisp feel in my mouth. Taste is not overpowering.

customer_reviews.title: Make breath smell good
customer_reviews.text: I like how make breath smell good..Yes Ok Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: Good Price. A cheaper price than any store around me.

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Strong ... flavor is ok ... burns mouth. Will not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Someone previously returned to you only 4 bottles...
customer_reviews.text: and placed them in a box that was printed for 6 bottles. It was a well-taped box that someone else returned. I'm still owed 2 more bottles.

customer_reviews.text: I oreder pack of 6 I received only 2 with dental floss soue debtaire !!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Product that doesn't burn the mouth
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews for other similar products that could burn the mouth, so I bought this one which is perfectly pain free to use and feel fresh after the use.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Tse

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Great product, thank you for the getting here so quickly also! thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price u cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and it was very well packaged and delivered. 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Better boxing needed.
customer_reviews.text: Outer box was intact, inner box’s top flap was sealed the bottoms wasn’t. Pillow pack was deflated and 3 of 6 bottles got creased tip and bottom. Though not leaking now, my intention was to store them, not for immediate use. So don’t know over time if these bottles will eventually leak or not.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S. Tormes

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mouthwash. The price is cheaper here then in the stores

customer_reviews.title: The taste
customer_reviews.text: This is what I used all the time just wanted to buy more

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Package nicely and secure. The Colgate Total Pro-Shield Alcohol free mouthwash, came in a (3)pack for a great price. I personally love this product. Great for sensitive gums and a long lasting mint taste.

customer_reviews.title: OVER PRICED
customer_reviews.text: Over priced, don't cheat yourself these are the small bottles. I thought they were the big bottles. You can get the big bottles for the same price

customer_reviews.title: Package not safe. Product great
customer_reviews.text: Product speaks for itself! Quick shipping, great packaging. BUT AS YOU CAN SEE PRODUCT WAS L FT ON THE LAWN BY THE STREET! Could be stolen, rained on and peeded on !
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lib

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably healthier gums
customer_reviews.text: Clean taste, no burn. Gums are noticeably healthier within the first week.

customer_reviews.title: They spill
customer_reviews.text: The taste is okay, but beware: this bottle design spills. A lot.

customer_reviews.title: Good smell
customer_reviews.text: Worth for money and the smell of this mouthwash is good.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorites
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best mouth wash that I have used. Great taste and gives the mouth a clean fresh smell as well.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Can’t wait until it’s gone so I can go back to using listerine.
customer_reviews.author: David Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Look no further this is the mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Dentist like clean, use with Colgate total toothpaste or gel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, fast shipping. Saw a product review on this and had to laugh because someone complained that the contents are carcinogenic. Yeah, if you're a lab rat watch out. Otherwise one has about as much chance of contracting cancer from using this product as one does from rinsing their mouth with tap water every day three times a day for 60 + years. I've used this for over a year and it does what it claims to do...
customer_reviews.author: P A

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: Palatable and if it does what it claims, it would be wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sammypot

customer_reviews.title: May have been tested on animals mouthwash.
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this product two stars because I recently found out that Colgate is not cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Minty without blowing your head off🙉❗️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got a really sensitive mouth so I cannot use mouthwash with alcohol in it. So many have it and those that don’t are really hard to find in the store. When I can find them, they’re often twice the price or in a teeny, tiny bottle😕 Amazon to the rescue and double yay, my favorite brand has alcohol free♥️ The mint flavor in this mouthwash is actually peppermint and it’s not so strong as to cause pain and lasts for 90 minutes to 2 hours if I don’t eat or drink. It’s available on Subscribe & Save and all’s right in this world, for sure🛎
customer_reviews.author: linda galella

customer_reviews.title: Finally---a mouthwash that doesn't burn!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product, mostly because I don't hesitate to use it!! Other mouthwashes with alcohol burn which makes me reluctant to actually use them. Also, this is great for people who can't use products with alcohol. My mouth feels fresh, so I'm a happy camper!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: works on funky bad breath!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Bought it for the hubby who is doing a weightloss/cleanse program. Boy did his breath get funky during the program! This product is better than others that we have habitually bought at the store for years. He even likes it better.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Light flavor.  Great value.  No coloring.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Best mouth wash I have ever had. It is so good light flavor that is not going to turn my stomach or lingering in my mouth. It is clear so no coloring added. Nothing harmful in this either. Just love how clean my mouth feels after using this.
customer_reviews.author: kitty64

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Can get the same product 2x volume for the same price at the local Target sorry I wasted my points on the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It makes me sneeze
customer_reviews.text: I like the mouth wash. Not too strong and quite pleasant. The only issue is it makes me sneeze! Every single time! It's not the end of the world, but it's annoying...
customer_reviews.author: RicAndTheWorld

customer_reviews.title: ... league as the purple listerine total care which was recommended to me by my dentist
customer_reviews.text: I find this mouth wash to be in the same league as the purple listerine total care which was recommended to me by my dentist. There's very little burning when using this product due to no alcohol being present. If you can get this for a good price I would recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: J.D

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfy !!  Bought it Again !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it Again !!! My Doctors recomend mouth wash with Cetylpyridinium Chloride (0.075%) !! Still a good value after recent price increase !!
customer_reviews.author: KC  Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years. I like the flavor. And getting three at a time is great. Recommend it highly.👍
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We still have 2 full bottles a month later with a 4 person family. Totally worth investing in! Unless you're a hosier.

customer_reviews.title: Missing 4 out of 6 bottles
customer_reviews.text: This is the extent of my order / TWO bottles received out of order of SIX. ?????? Quality control????

customer_reviews.title: No Alcohol Burning
customer_reviews.text: This is a fresh mouth wash cleaner with anti-bacterial properties with no tongue burning.

customer_reviews.title: Colgate Total Pro-Shield Alcohol Free Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Since the virus has kept us in our home, I ordered my favorable mouth wash with Amazon.

customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. Works like it always had. The box, however... I should have read the fine print. They are super small bottles. My bad.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The option of bulk in this size makes packing for weekend escapes much easier.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this particular mouthwash because at the time it ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular mouthwash because at the time it was the cheapest mouthwash on amazon. I am not impressed. I decided to start using mouthwash because despite brushing and flossing twice daily I am still getting plaque on my teeth. This product's label says that it "Significantly reduces plaque". However, it didn't reduce existing plaque no prevent the buildup of plaque between visits to the dentist. I won't be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This Mouthwash is very Refreshing and doesn't Burn my Cheeks! Love the Peppermint!
customer_reviews.author: WMorganTaylor

product_meta.title: Colgate Total Alcohol Free Mouthwash for Bad Breath, Peppermint - 1L, 33.8 fluid ounce (3 Pack)
product_meta.description: Style:Total Pro-Shield| Size:3 PacksColgate Total 12HR Pro-Shield Mouthwash doesn't just freshen breath, it provides 12-hour protection against germs, even after eating and drinking, helping to keep your mouth healthy and fresh. It kills 99% of germs on contact, significantly reduces plaque and helps prevent the gum disease gingivitis. Colgate Total 12HR Pro-Shield Mouthwash is an alcohol-free mouthwash (does not contain ethanol) and has a refreshing Peppermint Blast flavor. This antibacterial mouthwash offers germ protection for fresh breath.
feature_bullets: Antibacterial mouthwash provides 12 hour protection against germs after eating and drinking
Kills 99% of germs on contact for fresher breath
Peppermint flavor leaves your breath feeling clean and fresh for a 10X longer lasting cool
Reduces plaque and helps prevent gingivitis
Alcohol free mouthwash that does not contain ethanol, so there's no burn; fluoride free mouthwash formula
Pack of 3 bottles with 33.8 fluid ounces in each; a total of 101.4 fluid ounces

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
